name: Sylas
title: the Unshackled
lore: Raised in one of Demacia's lesser quarters, Sylas of Dregbourne has come to symbolize the darker side of the Great City. As a boy, his ability to root out hidden sorcery caught the attention of the notorious mageseekers, who eventually imprisoned him for turning those same powers against them. Having now broken free, Sylas lives as a hardened revolutionary, using the magic of those around him to destroy the kingdom he once servedâ€¦ and his band of outcast mage followers seems to grow by the day.
blurb: Raised in one of Demacia's lesser quarters, Sylas of Dregbourne has come to symbolize the darker side of the Great City. As a boy, his ability to root out hidden sorcery caught the attention of the notorious mageseekers, who eventually imprisoned him...
allytips: Wait for you or your enemy to reach low health before using Kingslayer for maximum effect.
Space out your ability usage to get maximum effect from Petricite Burst.
Clever use of enemy ultimates can open up new possibilities to approach teamfights.
enemytips: Sylas's healthbar can be deceptive, watch out for his Kingslayer!
Try to fight Sylas when he isn't able to take your ultimate.

riot_spells.name: Chain Lash
riot_spells.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage and increasing the slow.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Sylas lashes his chains out in an X-shaped area, intersecting at his targeted location dealing {{ damage }} magic damage to and slowing enemies by {{ slowamountcalc }} for 2 seconds.

After .5 seconds, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing {{ explosiondamage }} and increasing the slow by 50%.

The explosion deals {{ minionmodcalc }} damage to minions and monsters.

riot_spells.name: Kingslayer
riot_spells.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing {{ mindamage }} magic damage, increased to {{ maxdamage }} if the enemy is below 40% health.

Damaging enemy champions heals Sylas for {{ minhealing }}, increased to {{ maxhealing }} if Sylas is below 40% health.

riot_spells.name: Abscond / Abduct
riot_spells.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits. If he hits an enemy champion or monster, he gains a shield against magic damage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Sylas dashes to a location, gaining a magic damage absorbing shield for {{ shieldvalue }} for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

Recast: Sylas throws out his chain in a direction, pulling himself to the first enemy hit dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and knocking them up for .35 seconds.

riot_spells.name: Hijack
riot_spells.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Sylas hijacks a targeted enemy, allowing him to cast their ultimate ability as they would cast it, based on his Ultimate level and using his stats.

Hijacking an enemy places a cooldown on them for 200% (modified by Sylas' Cooldown Reduction, minimum {{ minimumenemycooldown }} seconds) of the enemy's ultimate's cooldown, during which time Sylas cannot hijack them again.

Sylas converts non-hybrid AD ratios into AP ratios, granting him .4 AP: 1 Bonus AD and .6 AP: 1 Total AD respectively.

riot_passive.name: Petricite Burst
riot_passive.description: After casting a spell, Sylas's next basic attack whirls his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit.

i1.name: Petricite Burst
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Casting an ability grants a stack of ''Petricite Burst'' for 4 seconds, up to 2 stacks.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Petricite Burst:}} '''Sylas' '''next basic attack is modified to whirl his chains around him, dealing {{pp|9 to 60|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the target and nearby enemies, reduced to 50% against minions who aren't the primary targets.
i1.notes:
* ''Petricite Burst'' cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.
* {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} damage will get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

q1.name: Chain Lash
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' lashes out two lines that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds.
q1.description2: After a {{fd|0.6}}-seconds delay, the chains' intersection detonates, dealing the same {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit for 2 seconds. Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} the detonation deals 45% reduced damage.
q1.effect_radius: {{tt|180|Detonation radius against champions and minions}} / {{tt|200|Detonation radius against monsters}}
q1.notes: * ''Chain Lash'' will fire from the original location even if '''Sylas''' is {{tip|airborne|displaced}}.

w1.name: Kingslayer
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|lunges}} at a target enemy with a powerful strike, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, increased by 50% against targets {{as|{{sti|health|'''below''' 40% health}}}}.
w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|65 to 205}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|65*1.5 to 205*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{fd|97.5}}% AP)}}}}
w1.description2: Against {{tip|champion|enemy champions}}, '''Sylas''' is {{tip|heal|healed}}, increased by 75% if he's {{as|{{sti|health|'''below''' 40% health}}}}.
w1.notes:
* Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.
* ''Kingslayer'' is able to make allied {{ci|Illaoi}} {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|Tentacles}} slam (including those spawned by a hijacked {{ai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}}).
** The tentacle attacks will regenerate '''Sylas's''' {{as|health}} and give him the {{g}} for its kills.
** ''Kingslayer'' is unable to queue up tentacle attacks (commanding them to attack while they're already attacking will not make them attack a second time).

e2.name: Abduct
e2.description: {{sbc|Active - Abduct:}} '''Sylas''' whips out his chains in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} the first enemy hit, {{tip|dash|pulling}} himself towards them, and {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them up for {{fd|0.35}} seconds upon arrival.

e1.name: Abscond
e1.description: {{sbc|Active - Abscond:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward to the target location, gaining a {{as|magic damage}} {{tip|shield}} for 2 seconds and resetting his basic attack timer.
e1.description2: For the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds, '''Sylas''' may cast {{ai|Abduct|Sylas}}.

r1.name: Hijack
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Hijack'' is available, '''Sylas''' can select a target enemy champion to gain a copy of their ultimate ability at the cost of mana. '''Sylas''' cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 90 seconds.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' casts his hijacked ultimate ability without cost, scaling based on ''Hijack's'' rank and his own statistics.
r1.description3: All ''Hijacked'' ultimates and abilities that do not scale with {{as|ability power}} have their {{as|attack damage}} ratios converted to {{as|ability power}} ratios, scaling with {{as|{{fd|0.6}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''total''' AD}}, and {{as|{{fd|0.4}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' AD}}.
r1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|This can be reduced by Sylas' cooldown reduction.}}
r1.custominfo: {{tt|200% of target's ultimate cooldown|A minimum of 40 seconds cooldown. Starts on steal, rather than on casting the stolen ability.}}
r1.notes:
* If the stolen ability is on-target and it loses its target during the cast time (i.e {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}}, lost of vision) the ability will cancel and go on cooldown.
* Since the copied ability scales based on ''Hijack's'' rank, abilities can be copied regardless of their rank.
* ''Hijack'' will copy all components of the ability: passives and actives as well as recast effects. ''Hijack'' will not trigger the effects of other abilities unless absolutely necessary. 
* Shape-shifting ultimates will transform '''Sylas''' into the target's alternate form, replacing his basic abilities and '''base''' stats. Namely: {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee|Cougar Form}}, {{ai|Spider Form|Elise}}, {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Form}} and {{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}.
** ''Dragon's Descent'' refreshes '''Sylas's''' mana, depleting it and regenerating it at the same rate ''Shyvana's'' {{tip|fury}} would. Other sources of mana restoration will extend the duration as well. At the end of the effect, '''Sylas''' gains his previous mana. 
** Permanent transformations last for ~5 minutes or until toggled off. 
** The alternate abilities of transforming champions will cost mana and scale with the ranks as appropriate for the ability (e.g. ranks in R for Nidalee and ranks in Q/W/E for Jayce/Elise).
** {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} stacks will still be gained from abilities cast in alternate forms, but the stacks are gained independently from the normal ones. All stacks gained while transformed are consumed with one basic attack.
*** This damage overrides {{cais|Takedown|Nidalee}} damage.
*** If '''Sylas''' has both normal and transformed stacks a basic attack will consume all transformed stacks and one normal stack, but the damage dealt will be based only on the amount of transformed stacks consumed.
* Ultimates comply with [[One For All]] rules if an ally is playing the hijacked champion. For example, an allied {{cai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} stacks will increase the damage of the hijacked Noxian Guillotine; or an allied {{cai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will add extra damage to hijacked Unleashed Power as well as producing 3 spheres that she can use.
;Notable Interactions
* {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} - Gains permanent ''Feast'' charges on-kill.
* {{cai|Missile Barrage|Corki}} - Gains max charges. 
* {{cai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} - Does not gain {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} and so the ultimate deals minimal damage.
* {{cai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}} - Gains movement speed in the effect and can trigger the area healing, but Vitals do not deal bonus damage.
* {{cai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} - Does not steal cannon upgrades.
* {{cai|Demacian Justice|Garen}} - No Villain is marked, as such it will only deal magic damage.
* {{cai|GNAR!|Gnar}} - Gains a usable ultimate even if Mini Gnar is targeted.
* {{cai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Heimerdinger's'' empowered abilities.
* {{cai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}} - Does not reduce {{ais|Kingslayer|Sylas}} cooldown. 
* {{cai|Killer Instinct|Kai'Sa}} - '''Sylas'''' basic attacks, {{ai|Abscond / Abduct|Sylas}} and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizations}} apply stacks of {{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Plasma}}, up to 4. '''Sylas''' is unable to apply the 5th stack necessary to expunge the stacks.
* {{cai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} - '''Sylas''' begins the game with {{ii|The Black Spear}}.
* {{cai|Mantra|Karma}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Karma's'' empowered abilities.
* {{cai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}} - Based on current form.
* {{cai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}} - Based on current evolution. 
* {{cai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}} - Does not need mount.
* {{cai|Mimic|LeBlanc}} - Uses the empowered version of ''LeBlanc's'' last cast basic ability. If she has not cast any spells, {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} is copied.
* {{cai|Highlander|Master Yi}} - Kills do not reduce Sylas' basic ability cooldowns.
* {{cai|Command: Shockwave|Orianna}} - Self-cast.
* {{cai|Thrill of the Hunt|Rengar}} - '''Sylas''' will gain {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} on his next attack.
* {{cai|Demonic Ascension|Swain}} - '''Sylas''' always has full soul fragments regardless of how many Swain has.
* {{cai|Hijack|Sylas}} - Steals the ability that the enemy ''Sylas'' has stolen. Cannot be targeted if no ability has been stolen.
* {{cai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} - Throws the minimum of 3 spheres, which are left on the ground afterwards.
* {{cai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} - Gains max charges.
* {{cai|Spray and Pray|Twitch}} - Gains 300 attack range and his attacks produce missiles that travel 850 range. These attacks are classified as melee, and so will trigger effects such as Tiamat versus every target.
* {{ci|Udyr}} - Steals {{ai|Phoenix Stance|Udyr}}. Lasts for 2 empowered attacks. 
* {{cai|Final Hour|Vayne}} - Gains the {{as|AD}} and {{as|MS}} bonuses. Additionally, '''Sylas''' gains {{tip|invisibility}} when he casts {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}. 
* {{cai|Life Form Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}} - Does not apply {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}}.
* {{cai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} - PENDING: Does he steal the Hex Core evolution?
* {{cai|Death Mark|Zed}} - Shadow does not mimic spells but can be reactivated to swap places.
* {{cai|Portal Jump|Zoe}} - '''Sylas''' can use his spells for the 1 second at the target location, but not during the jump.
